scenarios.name: Create fresh business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_sarah_fresh name = Sarah Fresh Coaching slug = sarah-fresh status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_fresh biz_id = biz_sarah_fresh name = Fresh Office slug = fresh-office timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create venue
scenarios.prompt: insert into venues id = ven_fresh biz_id = biz_sarah_fresh location_id = loc_fresh name = Fresh Venue slug = fresh-venue setup_minutes = 5 teardown_minutes = 5

scenarios.name: Create host user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_fresh_uc1 email = fresh.uc1@example.com name = SarahFresh status = active

scenarios.name: Create resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_fresh biz_id = biz_sarah_fresh location_id = loc_fresh type = host host_user_id = usr_fresh_uc1 name = Sarah Fresh slug = sarah-fresh timezone = America/Los_Angeles buffer_before_minutes = 10 buffer_after_minutes = 10 capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create service group
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_groups id = sg_fresh biz_id = biz_sarah_fresh name = Fresh Services slug = fresh-services status = active

scenarios.name: Create calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendars id = cal_fresh biz_id = biz_sarah_fresh name = Fresh Calendar timezone = America/Los_Angeles slot_duration_min = 50 slot_interval_min = 50 pre_buffer_min = 10 post_buffer_min = 10 min_advance_booking_hours = 24 max_advance_booking_days = 60 status = active

scenarios.name: Create offer
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_fresh biz_id = biz_sarah_fresh name = Fresh Coaching slug = fresh-coaching execution_mode = slot status = active is_published = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles
